titles: Looke to it: for, Ile stabbe ye
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
publisher: By E. Allde for W. Ferbrand, and George Loftes, and are to be solde in Popes-head Allie,
notes: Signed at end: S.R., i.e. Samuel Rowlands.
